text:
e="preserve">Charles A. Reich (May 20, 1928 – June 15, 2019) was an American legal and social scholar. He was a Professor at Yale Law School when he wrote the 1970 paean to the 1960s counterculture and youth movement, "The Greening of America". Reich was born in New York City.
Reich died on June 15, 2019 in San Francisco, California at the age of 91.
